Trump gives Nvidia green light to sell advanced AI chips to China

AI 5 min read

In a significant development, former President Donald Trump has authorized Nvidia to sell its advanced artificial intelligence (AI) chips to China, marking a shift in U.S. policy regarding high-tech exports. This decision could have broad implications for U.S.-China relations, as well as for the AI industry, as Nvidia's chips are key components in developing cutting-edge technology.
